SESS_MESS <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "250")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, SESS_PARAMS <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "250")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, INSERT INTO TEMP_SNP_SESSION ( SESS_NO, SESS_NAME, SCEN_VERSION, LOG_LEVEL, THREAD_ID, THREAD_CREATION, SESS_BEG, SESS_END, SESS_DUR, SESS_STATUS, SESS_RC, SESS_MESS, SESS_PARAMS, SESS_KEYWORDS, MASTER_AGENT_NAME, SYNCHRO, AGENT_NAME, CONTEXT_CODE, PARENT_SESS_NO, NB_CHILD_RUN, NB_CHILD_OK, NB_CHILD_KO, SCEN_NAME, USER_NAME ) SELECT SESS_NO, SESS_NAME, SCEN_VERSION, LOG_LEVEL, THREAD_ID, THREAD_CREATION, SESS_BEG, SESS_END, SESS_DUR, SESS_STATUS, SESS_RC, SESS_MESS, SESS_PARAMS, SESS_KEYWORDS, MASTER_AGENT_NAME, SYNCHRO, AGENT_NAME, CONTEXT_CODE, PARENT_SESS_NO, NB_CHILD_RUN, NB_CHILD_OK, NB_CHILD_KO, SCEN_NAME, USER_NAME FROM SNP_SESSION

CREATE TABLE TEMP_SNP_SESS_STEP ( SESS_NO <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> NOT NULL, NNO <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> NOT NULL, NB_RUN <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, STEP_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "75")?> NOT NULL, STEP_TYPE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "2")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, CONTEXT_CODE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, VAR_NAME <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "71")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, VAR_INCR <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, VAR_OP <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "2")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, VAR_VALUE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "250")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, OK_EXIT_CODE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> NOT NULL, OK_EXIT <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> NOT NULL, OK_NEXT_STEP <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, KO_RETRY <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, KO_RETRY_INTERV <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, KO_EXIT_CODE <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "35")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, KO_EXIT <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> NOT NULL, KO_NEXT_STEP <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, MAX_ERR <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_NUMERIC", "10")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, MAX_ERR_PRCT <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?>, IND_LOG_METHOD <?=snpRef.getDataType("SRC_VARCHAR", "1")?> <?=snpRef.getInfo("SRC_DDL_NULL")?> ) LOCK DATAROWS
